Description: * Fixed players being able to exploit {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}} sharing across multiple lanes to earn more {{PageRef|Souls|alt_name={{PageRef|Souls|alt_name=soul}}s}} than intended. The way the fix is implemented is that each player can only be considered for an enemy trooper death event 4 times per wave number during the laning phase.
* Fixed troopers sometimes not dying after doing their death flash state
* Fixed {{PageRef|Unstoppable}} state not preventing fire rate reductions
* Fixed {{PageRef|Grey Talon}}'s Charge Shot and {{PageRef|Vindicta}}'s {{PageRef|Assassinate}} cameras not working properly
